Literature.Title: Linear bactenecin analogs with cell selectivity and anti-endotoxic activity.
Literature.Author: Hai Nan Y, Jacob B, Kim Y, Yub Shin SY

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli KCTC 1682(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 1637(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium KCTC 1926(MIC=1.56µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis KCTC 3068(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis KCTC 1917(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(10-20% Killing=400µg/ml)
